name: Stacks 2
description:
Stacks 2

Stacks 2 is a simple puzzle game like the Tower of Hanoi.

This game is playable in mobile and desktop browsers.

  • Playable: https://stackshub.github.io/stacks2/
  • Repository: https://github.com/stackshub/stacks2
How to play
  • First, tap a stack to pop a piece.
  • Then, tap another stack to push the piece.
  • Finally, arrange all pieces within the limit.
Keyboard controls KeyControlLeft, AMove cursor leftRight, DMove cursor rightUp, WPop / PushDown, S,UndoEscape,RetryEnter, SpaceNext Game Off 2019 "LEAPS AND BOUNDS"
  • When the checkmate, the piece leaps up and bounces down.
  • Every time to complete a level, the complexity increses by leaps and bounds.
